title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 474.3 - Loss, mutilation or destruction of permits, plates and stickers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 474.3 - Loss, mutilation or destruction of permits, plates and stickers

State Regulations

If a permit is lost, mutilated or destroyed, the State

Tax Commission will issue a duplicate upon application therefor and payment of
a fee of $1. Similarly, in the event of the loss, mutilation or destruction of
a plate or sticker, a substitute one will be issued upon application therefor
and payment of $2. Application for a duplicate permit or substitute plate or
sticker should be made on form TMT-334. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
474.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
